Uses of Class
it.polito.verifoo.rest.common.BadGraphException

  • Packages that use BadGraphException 
    Package Description
    it.polito.verifoo.rest.common  

    • Uses of BadGraphException in it.polito.verifoo.rest.common

      Methods in it.polito.verifoo.rest.common that throw BadGraphException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void VerifooProxy.checkNffg()
      Checks if in the xml there are only one node that is a client and one node that is a server and they are for the same service (web or mail), then it calls the function to create the link from the node's neighbours.
      private void VerifooProxy.checkPhysicalNetwork()
      Checks if in the xml there are only one host client and one host server, then it calls the function to calculate all the possible paths from the host client to the host server
      private void VerifooProxy.createLink(Node prec, Node current, Node server)
      Creates the link from the node's neighbours
      private void VerifooProxy.createRoutingTables(Node client, Node server)
      Creates the routing table by adding the rules by exploring for each possible path between an host client and host server all the possibles deploying scenarios for the nodes
      void NodeNetworkObject.generateVPN()
      Generates the vpn model
      private void VerifooProxy.setConditions()
      Sets all the conditions for the nodes.
      private boolean VerifooProxy.setNextHop(Node source, Node server, int nChain, int level, java.lang.String hostServer)
      Explores recursively all the possible solution for setting a next hop condition
      Constructors in it.polito.verifoo.rest.common that throw BadGraphException

      This class convert our EndHost Packet Model configuration in the verigraph one
